meanings.definition: The act of causing a bruise on the skin.
meanings.sent1: After the fall, the bruising on his arm was visible.
meanings.sent2: She gently touched the bruising on her leg.
meanings.sent3: The bruising on the apple made it look like a tiny painting.
meanings.sent4: The storm left a bruising on the landscape.
meanings.sent5: The bruising on the peach resembled a sunset.

meanings.definition: Showing signs of injury or damage.
meanings.sent1: The bruising car was parked in the driveway.
meanings.sent2: Her bruising words left a lasting impact.
meanings.sent3: The bruising sky warned of an impending storm.
meanings.sent4: The team faced a bruising defeat in the championship.
meanings.sent5: His bruising expression revealed his disappointment.

meanings.definition: The process of becoming discolored due to trauma.
meanings.sent1: The bruising of the fruit indicated it was overripe.
meanings.sent2: His face showed signs of bruising after the accident.
meanings.sent3: The bruising of the sky at sunset was breathtaking.
meanings.sent4: The bruising of the leaves in autumn was a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent5: The bruising of the clouds painted a dramatic scene.
